body.name: PrimZooty Extra Large Utensil Holder for Kitchen Counter - 15.7"x 6.7"x 4.4", Aesthetic Design, Anti-Slip Mat, 4 Compartments, Black Cooking Utensil Organizer for Countertop, Spatula Utensil Caddy
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 4 hrs 17 mins
FREE pickup Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: HOLDS 45 UTENSILS IN 4 COMPARTMENTS: Are you tired of rummaging through an overflowing kitchen drawer just to find the right utensils? If you have a ton of utensils, you definitely need this spacious utensil caddy. With 4 roomy compartments, this kitchen utensil organizer can hold at least 45 cooking utensils! Measures 15.7"x 6.7"x 4.4". SAY GOODBYE to squeezing your utensils together or jamming them inside drawers.

NON-SLIP MAT & STABLE BAMBOO BASE: The Anti-Slip mat prevents the utensils from slipping. The sturdy metal material and premium thick bamboo base ensure that this utensil caddy stays in place without slipping or tipping. Weighing 1.8 lbs., this steel bamboo kitchen counter organizer provides excellent stability. Additionally, four non-slip pads on the base of this cooking utensil holder protect your countertop from scratches.

VERSATILE USES: With its wide-opening wire design and solid bamboo base, this kitchen utensil holder offers a perfect platform for storing all your larger cooking utensils such as spatulas, ladles, whisks, tongs, servers, and turners. Maximize your countertop space with this convenient utensil organizer. Apart from kitchen utensil storage, this black utensil holder can also be used for storing cutlery, office supplies, craft supplies, and more.

STURDY CONSTRUCTION, LASTS FOR YEARS: Crafted from rust-resistant steel and premium bamboo, this utensil holder for the kitchen counter is built to withstand everyday use. Its heavy-duty construction ensures durability for years to come.

MODERN FARMHOUSE KITCHEN DECOR: The Aesthetic metal wire design of this utensil organizer for the countertop adds a decorative and functional touch to your home. The black finish complements any kitchen decor style, making it an excellent addition to your kitchen counter.

Great Gift Idea & Hassle-Free Purchase: Aside from being a practical kitchen accessories for countertop storage solution, this farmhouse style metal and bamboo utensil caddy is also a perfect gift for any home chef or connoisseur of cooking. This cooking tool holder undergo 3 quality inspections before shipping, ensuring satisfaction for friends and family who love to cook. In case you are not satisfied with this extra large utensil holder upon receiving it, please feel free to contact.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice, solid, bamboo + metal utensil holder
reviews.reviewText: This utensil holder looks and feels very durable. The base is a sturdy slab of wood/bamboo, and the metal wiring that makes up the rest of the structure seems quite strong as well.It's also relatively spacious, for what it is, and can hold quite a few items... It's a simple, utilitarian design that I think will be useful beyond just large utensils large serving spoons and spatulas -- if my wife ever decides we don't need this in the kitchen, I'll be very happy to use it in my workshop for storing tools and craft supplies... You could fit a lot of screwdrivers, wood chisels, or tubes of caulking tubes or whatever in this haha.So, yeah, overall I'm impressed by the quality of this utensil/tool holder.And although it's only designed to sit on a flat surface, I think it'd be pretty easy to mount this to a wall if needed as well, by using some small clamps or hooks to hold it up via the wire basket part of the structure, or, if you needed it to hold more weight, then some little "L" or triangular shelf brackets could be screwed into the wooden base and likewise connected to a wall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really nice and functional
reviews.reviewText: We have had a single cooking utensil holder for years and it was overstuffed with stuff. My wife and I both use totally different utensils for cooking so we have 3 or 4 of almost everything LOLThis 4 section utensil holder is perfect for use. One section is spoons, one section is spatulas, one section is bowl scrapers , and the 4th section is tongs.This holder comes completely assembled, just take it out of the box and start using.It looks nice, seems very well made and very sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This comes fully assembled, except for little rubber feet that are included. It's well made and sturdy, and the base is real bamboo. It's very roomy and looks well worth the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It fits so many
reviews.reviewText: Excellent utensil holder. It keeps all of the utensils, and a nice compact and portable storage. What I like most is that I can remove the utensil holder at any time to clean up easily underneath, and I can organize utensils according to the way I use them very useful and highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Roomy Utensil Holder
reviews.reviewText: This large utensil holder is very good. It's made of metal with a bamboo base. It has three big sections to hold utensils of all sizes. It holds all of my spoons, spatulas, whisks, scissors, tongues and more with room to spare. I really like that it came with four small corner knobs to raise it off of the counter, as an option. It's handy and keeps things organized and visible.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I use this holder for the outdoor table on the deck. It keeps all utensils together for transport and cleaning. It is also nice to have on the table for a clean look.
